name: Mayra Franco
offering: Children and Family, Communication Training, Group Coaching
what_you_do: I work with trauma-informed, somatic, and body-based approaches that support regulation, emotional safety, and integration for sensitive, capable women.
who_you_serve: I work with sensitive, capable women who feel stuck in patterns like overthinking, people-pleasing, shutdown, or hesitation.
business_focus: Providing trauma-informed, somatic, and body-based coaching to help sensitive, capable women overcome patterns like overthinking, people-pleasing, shutdown, or hesitation.
service_provided: trauma-informed coaching, somatic coaching, body-based coaching
